thread.title: Kim S

author: Kim S
title: Kim S
text:
Pricing was a little confusing at check out. It should show regular price while shopping then the deal after the promo code is put in. I said 55% off the entire purchase but also said free shipping over $50.
I wish it stated that you can only apply one promo code per order ahead of time and didn't imply %55 off your order and free shipping over $50. Either way though GREAT DEALS! As long as everything shows up within 3-5 days I'll be more than happy and will definitely purchase more. :)
